channel.title: Flink on RUHM BLOG SITE
channel.description: Recent content in Flink on RUHM BLOG SITE

item.title: flink 在 OSX 系统上以 local 方式运行
item.description: 安装 $ brew install apache-flink $ flink -v Version: 1.3.2, Commit ID: 0399bee $ brew info apache-flink apache-flink: stable 1.3.2, HEAD Scalable batch and stream data processing https://flink.apache.org/ /usr/local/Cellar/apache-flink/1.3.2 (108 files, 156.6MB) * Built from source on 2018-03-13 at 19:31:16 启动 $ cd /usr/local/Cellar/apache-flink/1.3.2 $ ./libexec/bin/start-local.sh Starting jobmanager daemon on host alastairruhm.local.
